reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting it looks great even in 80-degree heat, and appreciate its high neck cut and forgiving waistline. Moreover, the dress is comfortable enough for dancing the night away, and customers consider it a great wedding guest option, with one mentioning it's perfect for outdoor spring events. However, the material quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising the silk/sa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cocktail dress
items.body: Love the color and I got tons of compliments when I wore it to a conference! Very classy, I love the high neck. It stayed relatively wrinkle-free throughout the day after ironing too! True to size but you could size down if you really want it to snatch the waist. It has the slightest bit of stretchiness; it’s not a completely rigid fabric which I like, it was a comfortable wear for a long day. I accidentally ran it through the laundry without following the care instructions, and nothing happened to the color, shape, seams, etc. Overall a really great dress!! Read more
items.author: Leah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: This was a last minute purchase. Had ordered another dress, from another vendor, that didn't arrive in time. Jumped on Amazon to save the day. This dress arrived in time for a the wedding, steamed out the creases, easily and off to the wedding we went. This dress fit perfectly. I ordered a small. I'm 5'8, 34D, 27 waist, 38 hip. I received many compliments and can't wait to wear it again. The color is beautiful, brilliant blue is what I ordered. It matched perfectly with my daughter's dress. Hand washed, came out great. The material is perfect thickness, not sheer, didn't wrinkle during our 40 minute drive and looked great even in the 80 degree heat and humidity. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing style… fabric holds onto everything it touches
items.body: The dress was absolutely gorgeous and fit beautifully. It was true to size with a great overall feel and flattering look! HOWEVER… I’m giving it 4 out of 5 stars because the fabric stains with practically anything that touches it — even plain water. The dress actually arrived with a few stains already on it, but since my event was just days away, I had no choice but to keep it. After washing, the stains seemed to disappear thankfully, but the moment I brushed against a damp bush, it was instantly ruined again. Once dry, the marks stayed. And don’t even think about sweating — any moisture leaves a visible stain. This is great if you are super careful with it once it’s on and it’s not an event where you will be hot. (I do know this tends to happen with some satins… this is one of those satins. Hahah) Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful dress
items.body: Beautiful and elegant dress! This dress is perfect, it looks elegant for any occasion. The fit is great, and it’s very comfortable. Would buy again and again. Fits true to size. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and comfortable
items.body: If you have doubts get this dress I have it in both the orange and lilac. It fits so well without shapewear. I love how classy it looks. Material is thin but not see through. Very comfortable and did not get hit in it. Hits me a bit longer because I’m short. Read more
items.author: Momoftres

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, but cumbersome...
items.body: For reference: I'm 5'1", 265lbs, 37" bust, 32" waist, 45" hip and ordered an XXL. I wore this to a summer wedding and it's a 3.5/5 for me. The dress is really pretty, but it's cumbersome to wear. The color is vibrant and true to the photos; the neckline drapes beautifully over the bust, and the dress feels luxurious against the skin. The fabric is lightweight which is good for spring and summer events. Though it's not see-through, it doesn't pass the belly button test, so shapewear is a must! My biggest gripe was the length not falling the same as the photos on me. If you have hips, gut and butt, the dress will wear significantly shorter. Other cons: the skirt rode up on me, and figuring out what bra to wear with it was a pain. I think if there was a 3XL, it would've flowed the way I envisioned more. Would not purchase again. Read more
items.author: Laila Ruiz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful silk fabric and colors are lovely
items.body: The stress is a beautiful design and extremely complementary to many body shapes. I bought it in four colors and will be traveling with you shortly.. It seems out easily and quickly Thank you for making a beautiful dress that easily goes from daytime to night time Read more
items.author: Kimmie O

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: This dress looks great in person and like it costs more than what it does. fits comfortably on the body and true to size. Read more
items.author: C. Garcia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brilliant Green, Brilliant Blue, Blue, Grass Green, Burgundy, Dusty Pink, Army Green, Black, Orange, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Navy, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
